title: Crystal Castles's Official Site including the latest music, albums, songs, music videos and updates
description: Crystal Castles's Official Site including the latest music, albums, songs, music videos and updates
cleaned_text: news New album "AMNESTY (l)" out now. Vinyl/CD includes bonus track "Kept". All band's proceeds from album will be donated to Amnesty International. Available On: [iTunes](https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/amnesty-i/id1145039232)| Enth 05 Sadist 06 Teach Her How to Hunt 07 Chloroform 08 Frail 09 Concrete 10 Ornament 11 Kept 12 Their Kindness Is Charade Lyrics: [http://crystalcastles.com/releases/amnesty-I/](http://crystalcastles.com/releases/amnesty-I/) --------------------------------------------------------- Aug 18 2016 SADIST a Edith: [link](https://www.facebook.com/ccrystalccastles/posts/10157261828535335) --------------------------------------------------------- Aug 16 2016 FLEECE --------------------------------------------------------- CHLOROFORM --------------------------------------------------------- Aug 4 2016 ENTH --------------------------------------------------------- Jul 11 2016 CHAR --------------------------------------------------------- Jul 6 2016 CONCRETE --------------------------------------------------------- Jul 6 2016 CONCRETE (link for Germany) --------------------------------------------------------- Jun 30 2016 FEMEN --------------------------------------------------------- Jul 2 2015 DEICIDE [https://soundcloud.com/crystal-castles/deicide](https://soundcloud.com/crystal-castles/deicide) --------------------------------------------------------- Apr 16 2015 FRAIL [https://soundcloud.com/crystal-castles/frail](https://soundcloud.com/crystal-castles/frail) --------------------------------------------------------- Jul 29 2013 Untrust Us covered by Capital Children's Choir
